marklogic.body:
After fatally shooting 17-year-old Trayvon Martin on February 26, 2012, neighborhood "vigilante" George Zimmerman lied and told Florida police he killed Trayvon in "self-defense." Self-defense?! Since when is stalking a child and shooting him in the chest an of self-defense? Several witnesses to this pre-meditated slaughter said they heard a struggle between two males in their back yards. Imagine how frightened Trayvon must have been when he was confronted by a stranger who was more than 80 pounds heavier and carrying a handgun; his fear more pronounced because he knew he was being tracked.
Zimmerman's conscience has to be eating at him like hot acid. Imagine how devastated he must have felt when he realized he had just killed a boy. National outrage will probably lead to his being arrested and charged (at least) with manslaughter. He probably breaks out in Cold sweats 1,000 times a day -- heart Palpitations; flushes of adrenalin; feelings of shame, depression, and guilt. No matter how often Zimmerman claims he Acted in "self-defense," he and the rest of the world knows he pursued and killed an innocent child without provocation.
